ch.epfl.lasec.universitycontest
Class ServerManager

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.lasec.universitycontest.ServerManager

public class ServerManager
extends java.lang.Object

Class used to manage the University Contest Server. Allows the admin to add new challenges, assign new challenges to team. Add new teams. Add new universities.

Author:
Sebastien Duc
